short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Detects marketing and growth plugins used on stores

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Louie’s Growth Sniffer by 4 Bullet Points is a powerful, free Chrome extension designed to reveal the marketing and growth tools used by any online store. Quickly uncover competitor insights and understand which plugins and technologies drive their success—all with a single click.

Key Features:

- Instant Plugin Detection: Identify the growth and marketing tools used on any Shopify or eCommerce site effortlessly.
- Competitor Insights: See exactly what strategies top brands use to boost engagement and conversions.
- Easy to Use: Simply visit a store, and Louie’s Growth Sniffer detects the tools in real-time—no -complex setup needed.
- Free Forever: Enjoy unrestricted access to insights at no cost, allowing you to explore, learn, and optimize continuously.

Whether you're a brand owner, marketer, or eCommerce enthusiast, Louie’s Growth Sniffer provides a straightforward way to stay competitive and informed.
